objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Drama lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about health and fitness using neutral register
Students create original drama themed content about health and fitness in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Drama story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in drama context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within drama theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
